name: Breeze Lodge
description:
Welcome to Breeze Lodge! Brisbane's newest, cleanest and most luxurious hostel!

Forget about smelly rooms, dirty kitchens and filthy bathrooms - here at Breeze Lodge we do things differently. We will only offer you the best facilities! To name a few‚Ä¶

-FREE WIFI throughout the entire hostel! 

-A ROOF TOP with lounge chairs and a great view over the city. 
Sunbathers and tanorexics - this is where you want to be!

-A COMFY BED IN A SPACIOUS ROOM with your own power point, light and locker. 
No more fighting over who gets to charge his phone first!

But most importantly‚Ä¶ 

-TWO BIG LOUNGE AREAS WITH NETFLIX! 

üïí RECEPTION & CHECK-IN TIMES
Reception is open daily from 10:00 AM to 10:00 PM.
Standard check-in: 2:00 PM to 9:30 PM.
After-hours check-in is available by request only and must be arranged in advance.

‚úÖ CHECK-IN REQUIREMENTS
You must present:
üõÇ A physical passport ‚Äì digital copies are not accepted.
üí≥ A physical credit card in your name ‚Äì virtual or third-party cards are not accepted.
Both documents must match the reservation name.

üïó EARLY CHECK-IN
Our standard check-in time is 2:00 PM.
You're welcome to arrive after 10:00 AM, when reception opens.
Feel free to use our facilities (lounge, rooftop, kitchen, WiFi) or leave your bags with us while you explore Brisbane.
We‚Äôll do our best to have your room ready as early as possible.

üåô LATE CHECK-IN (AFTER 10:00 PM)
We offer self-check-in:
1Ô∏è‚É£ Send us your email to receive the online check-in form
2Ô∏è‚É£ Make sure payment is completed
3Ô∏è‚É£ We'll email you self-check-in instructions

‚ö†Ô∏è Self-check-in is only available if requested in advance and must be completed before 9:30 PM.


üö´ Electric bicycles are not accepted at Breeze Lodge.

üë• GROUP BOOKINGS
Subject to availability and cannot be guaranteed.

üìç LOCATION HIGHLIGHTS
‚úîÔ∏è 7-minute walk to the free City Hopper ferry (CBD & Southbank)
‚úîÔ∏è 8-minute walk to Woolloongabba Bus Station & Coles
‚úîÔ∏è Steps from Kangaroo Point Cliffs ‚Äì perfect for amazing city views!

We‚Äôre looking forward to welcoming you!
‚Äì The Breeze Lodge Team

houseRules.notes:
Guests are required to show a photo identification (Physical Passport ) and credit card (MasterCard / VISA) upon check-in. 
Cash is not accepted at the hostel. 
Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

Current reception opening hours from 10am-10pm.
Check in: 14:00-22:00 

Breeze Lodge has a 'No Party Policy'. Any such bookings will be cancelled, with no refund given. Children under 18 years of age cannot be accommodated at Breeze Lodge. Please note on-site free parking is available, however it is limited.Guests are most welcome to park in the residential streets surrounding the hostel as there are plenty of free parking spaces available.

STRICTLY NOT ALLOWED: Electric bicycles, electric scooters, and charging of batteries.

No refund for early check outs.
